document.full_text: the most unusual aspect of the private equity industry in brazil is that its success thus far has had nothing to do with burdening its acquisition targets with heaps of expensive debt.
document.title: in brazil, no room for leverage at buyout firms
lines_and_colors: the most unusual aspect of the private equity industry in brazil is that its success thus far has had nothing to do with burdening its acquisition targets with heaps of expensive debt.
